snippet: President Obama, in nominating Chuck Hagel, said he would be the “first person of enlisted rank” to run the Pentagon, but at least four defense secretaries were, too.
abstract: Pres Obama, in nominating Chuck Hagel to be secretary of defense, said he would be 'first person of enlisted rank' to run Pentagon, but at least four other American defense secretaries served part of their military careers as enlisted men; Hagel would be only Pentagon chief to have served his entire military career as enlisted man.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, in nominating Chuck Hagel, said he would be the “first person of enlisted rank” to run the Pentagon, but at least four defense secretaries were, too.

headline.seo: Hagel Wouldn’t Be First Enlisted Man as Pentagon Chief
headline.main: For Hagel, a Distinction Comes With an Asterisk
headline.print_headline: For Hagel, a Distinction Comes With an Asterisk

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
